metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5360 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF before 4.0.6 mishandles the reading of TIFF files, as demonstratedby a heap-based buffer over-read in the ReadTIFFImage function incoders/tiff.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.27.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6').
